chat.title: Photo consults are easy!
chat.list_1: Click ‘Start’ below and get ready to snap some pictures for us
chat.list_2: Tell us a few medical bits we need to know
chat.list_3: We’ll send your doctor’s report and prescription to you, usually within a few hours
chat.microcopy: {0} for first consultation, {1} for any follow-up if needed
chat.doctor_microcopy: Our doctors are all board-certified in dermatology, working as senior NHS consultants in busy clinics and hospitals across the country.

video.title: Order video consultation
video.intro: See a dermatologist by video when and where you want to get medical advice, prescriptions and referrals.
video.list_1: Book an appointment in the calendar
video.list_2: Receive SMS with link before appointment
video.list_3: See your dermatologist over a video call
video.doctor_microcopy: Our doctors are all board-certified in dermatology, working as senior NHS consultants in busy clinics and hospitals across the country.

partnerlogin.title: Submit picture to skin doctor
partnerlogin.thankyou: Write a referral to Snapmed with this code. We will answer the case within 24 hours and get back to you.

check.title: Hi and welcome to Snapmed
check.subtitle: We will now ask you a few questions about your skin.
check.otp_error: Your one time code is incorrect.
check.otp_retry: Please input your one-time code again.
check.phone_error: Phone number is incorrect. Please supply a mobile phone number that can receive SMS.
check.email_error: Your email is incorrect. Please supply an email that can receive verification email.
check.finishsubtitle: One of our dermatologists will look at your case as soon as possible. You will get an SMS when your assessment is ready.
check.minor: By inputing this information you confirm you are the legal guardian of the minor and have the right to submit and receive health information on their behalf.
check.picture_upload_sub_text: Clicking here will take you to login
check.login_details_sub_heading: Create new account or log into your existing account here
check.login_details_sub_text: Clicking here will take you to patient information
check.medical_history_sub_text: You are almost there, keep going :)
check.payment_details_sub_text: We will notify you as soon as your case has been reviewed

payment.promo: Add promo code or referral code
payment.description: You will receive an answer in the next 24 hours

results.not_ready: Your assessment is not finished. You will receive an SMS when it is completed.

response.email_not_verified: Please verify your email by clicking on the link sent to your registered email.

password.title: Change your existing password
password.empty_err: Please fill in the above details.
password.length_err: A new password must be at least six characters long.
password.confirm_err: New and confirm passwords do not match.
password.match_err: Your current password does not match with the password you provided. Please try again.
password.same_err: A new password cannot be the same as your current password. Please choose a different password.
password.error: Something went wrong. Please contact the support team.
password.expire: Seems like an invalid or used link.
password.updated:
Your password has been reset.
Click here to Log in

modal.title: Why do you need a follow-up assessment?

login.title: Login to continue
login.sub_header: Input your phone number and your new or existing password

appointment.error: You have no longer selected an appointment. Can you go back and choose a new time?

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe what the inquiry is about

terms.label: I have read and accept Snapmed's {0}.

picture.step1: Your case will be reviewed by one our Dermatologist in the next 24 hours.
picture.step2: Once your assessment is complete you will be notified via SMS.
picture.sub-text: You can subscribe to our free monthly newsletter to get expert advice and exclusive offers from our dermatologists delivered straight to your inbox.
picture.success: Your Email is subscribed with us. You will hear from us soon

what-happens-next.heading: What happens next :
what-happens-next.list1: Your dermatologist will review your case.
what-happens-next.list2: You will be notified with a link to see your report.
what-happens-next.list3: You will be notified separately regarding your prescription medications.

picture-uk.queries: For queries, please use our chat feature, or reach us at

skin_select.note_detail: In medical dermatology, some conditions appear more often in certain skin tones, or can vary in their appearance. Your clinician needs to know the natural colour of your skin.

header.existing-header: Please login to authenticate yourself, we will be able to fetch your information
header.new-authentication: Please confirm the details below for authentication purposes, In the future, you can access your case, medical profile and diagnosis by simply logging in.

medical_details_editor.skin_conditions: Any skin condition which runs in the family :

image.error: Error uploading picture. Please try again.
image.id_proof_tooltip_text: This is a regulatory requirement. It's how we protect your identity, and help keep your records secure.

key.error: Something went wrong. Please contact the support team.
key.otp_error: Your one-time code is incorrect. Please try again.
key.email_sent: To complete the password reset, please click the secure link in the email we just sent to your registered email address.
key.email_absent: No registered email found. Please contact snapmed support team for password reset.

login.bankid: We use BankID for authentication. Click the button to log in.
login.key: Please enter the one-time code we sent you by SMS.
login.error: Phone number and/or password is incorrect. Please try again.
login.phone: To notify you and let you log in to review your case, please provide your phone number.
login.password: You need to create a password or enter your existing password to submit and review your case later.

otp.verify: Please enter the code you received on SMS

video.description: Describe what the inquiry is about

who.question: Is the assessment for yourself or a minor?

question.other: How old is the minor you are in care for?

description.question:
Tell us about your condition by describing:
1. How long have you had this condition?
2. Where on your body is it?
3. Any itching, stinging, bleeding or pain?
4. Any previous treatment?
5. Have you been to a doctor?

uk_description.question: Please describe your condition
uk_description.description: Where is it? what does it feel like?

body_part.question: Where on the body is it?
body_part.placeholder: For example, eyelids, scalp, neck, elbow, arms, legs

duration.question: How long have you had this?

time.question: How fast do you want an answer?

info.question: Please provide your payment information to complete your order.

imagecloseup.question: Please upload an up-close photo
imagecloseup.description: Hold camera 10 cm/4 inches away from the affected area

imageoverview.question: Please upload a farther-away photo
imageoverview.description: We also need an overview picture, about 30 cm/ 12 inches away.

question.subtext: Men's and women's skin problems can vary

medication.question: Are you on any medication? If yes, for how long?

medication_description.placeholder: List each medication and for how long have you been taking it

treatment.question: Have you had treatment for any other medical issue?

treatment_description.placeholder: List all, not just skin conditions

family_history.question: Any type of skin diseases that runs in the family?

size.question: Has the affected area expanded during the past weeks?

doctor.question: Have you been to your family doctor with the same condition?

change.question: Do you have the same symptoms on other parts of you body?

description.question: Could you provide a further description? Please describe if the area easily starts to bleed, if it hurts and a crust forms and falls of. Have you treated the area with something?

reset.label: To reset your password, enter your registered phone number.

category.ok: Apparently a condition that do not require further follow-up from a physician, with exception if the condition changes.
category.warn: Should be further assessed by a general physician or dermatologist.
category.check: Should be further assessed by a general physician or dermatologist.
